How many people are affected by Dowling-Degos disease ?,"Dowling-Degos disease appears to be a rare condition, although its prevalence is unknown.",GHR,Dowling-Degos disease
What are the genetic changes related to Dowling-Degos disease ?,"Mutations in the KRT5 gene cause Dowling-Degos disease. The KRT5 gene provides instructions for making a protein called keratin 5. Keratins are a family of proteins t
